page.title: Computer Associates to Cut 800 Jobs
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Software maker Computer Associates <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CA.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CA.N</A> on Wednesday said it would cut 800 jobs, or 5 percent of its work force, to cut costs amid weaker demand and falling prices for software and services.
